relation: Another Mr. Saturn that I whipped up. I think it turned out fairly well, probably better than my previous versions.

Another experiment in subdued colours, it's Threed's Handsome Tom, out (or being taken out?) on an evening prowl. For the record, I find that Handsome Tom is infinitly more interesting to colour than his counterpart, Smilin' Sam. I mean, who MAKES a purple-skinned dummy?... Now THAT'S creepy.
A spoof on the infamous, hilarious Monkey Island line. I especially like how the little Ness silhouette turned out in this one. This was another experiment in subdued colours.
A study I did for the EarthBound fangame I'm working on. The study remains unfinished as I got what I wanted from it and went on to make the actual sprite. Sorry if that's too much of a spoiler...
textBeforeTable: > 1 < Other Submissions by ozwalled Wooly Shambler and made it look hairy, I decided to try to do it more on purpose this time with another subject. Enter Might Bear Seven (an enemy with one of the more intriguing names in EB, I'd say -- what ever DID happen to the other Might Bears?... Plus, his fur is bluish green. What 's up with THAT?!). I even tried to keep the bulish purple from the original sprite in there.
